00055 void testWithSentence(Analyzer* analyzer)
00056 {
00057     cout << "########## test method runWithSentence()" << endl;
00058     
00059     Sentence s;
00060     string line;
00061     cout << "please input sentence ended with newline:" << endl;
00062     while(getline(cin, line))
00063     {
00064         s.setString(line.c_str());
00065 
00066         int result = analyzer->runWithSentence(s);
00067         if(result != 1)
00068         {
00069             cerr << "fail in Analyzer::runWithSentence()" << endl;
00070             exit(1);
00071         }
00072 
00073         // get n-best results
00074         if(s.getListSize() == 0)
00075         {
00076             cout << "no n-best result exists." << endl;
00077         }
00078         else
00079         {
00080             cout << "n-best result:" << endl;
00081             for(int i=0; i<s.getListSize(); ++i)
00082             {
00083                 cout << "\t" << i << ": ";
00084                 for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j)
00085                 {
00086                     cout << s.getLexicon(i, j) << "(" << s.getBaseForm(i, j) << ")/" << s.getStrPOS(i, j) << "  ";
00087                 }
00088                 cout << "\t" << s.getScore(i) << "\t#words: " << s.getCount(i) << endl;
00089             }
00090             cout << endl;
00091         }
00092 
00093         // get one-best result
00094         int i= s.getOneBestIndex();
00095         if(i == -1)
00096         {
00097             cout << "no one-best result exists." << endl;
00098         }
00099         else
00100         {
00101             cout << "one-best result:" << endl;
00102             cout << "\t" << i << ": ";
00103             for(int j=0; j<s.getCount(i); ++j)
00104             {
00105                 cout << s.getLexicon(i, j) << "(" << s.getBaseForm(i, j) << ")/" << s.getStrPOS(i, j) << "  ";
00106             }
00107             cout << "\t" << s.getScore(i) << endl;
00108         }
00109 
00110         cout << endl << "please input sentence ended with newline:" << endl;
00111     }
00112 }

00124     {
00125         cout << endl << "result:" << endl << analyzer->runWithString(line.c_str()) << endl;
00126         cout << endl << "please input string ended with newline:" << endl;

00133 void testWithStream(Analyzer* analyzer, const char* source, const char* dest)
00134 {
00135     cout << "########## test method runWithStream()" << endl;
00136 
00137     int result = analyzer->runWithStream(source, dest);
00138     if(result == 1)
00139     {
00140         cout << "succeed in runWithStream() from " << source << " to " << dest << endl;
00141     }
00142     else
00143     {
00144         cerr << "fail in runWithStream() from " << source << " to " << dest << endl;
00145         exit(1);
00146     }
00147 }

00152 void printUsage()
00153 {
00154     cerr << "Usages:\t" << OPTIONS[0] << " N-best [--dict DICT_PATH]" << endl;
00155     cerr << "  or:\t" << OPTIONS[1] << " [--dict DICT_PATH]" << endl;
00156     cerr << "  or:\t" << OPTIONS[2] << " INPUT OUTPUT [--dict DICT_PATH]" << endl;
00157 }
00158 
00162 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00163 {
00164     if(argc < 2)
00165     {
00166         printUsage();
00167         exit(1);
00168     }
00169 
00170     unsigned int optionIndex = 0;
00171     unsigned int optionSize = sizeof(OPTIONS) / sizeof(OPTIONS[0]);
00172     for(; optionIndex<optionSize; ++optionIndex)
00173     {
00174         if(! strcmp(argv[1], OPTIONS[optionIndex]))
00175             break;
00176     }
00177 
00178     // check argument
00179     if((optionIndex == optionSize)
00180             || (optionIndex == 0 && argc < 3) // command option "--sentence N-best"
00181             || (optionIndex == 2 && argc < 4)) // command option "--stream INPUT OUTPUT"
00182     {
00183         printUsage();
00184         exit(1);
00185     }
00186 
00187     // time evaluation for command option "--stream INPUT OUTPUT"
00188     clock_t stime = 0;
00189     if(optionIndex == 2)
00190     {
00191         stime = clock();
00192     }
00193     
00194     // create instances
00195     JMA_Factory* factory = JMA_Factory::instance();
00196     Analyzer* analyzer = factory->createAnalyzer();
00197     Knowledge* knowledge = factory->createKnowledge();
00198 
00199     // set default dictionary file
00200     const char* sysdict = TEST_JMA_DEFAULT_SYSTEM_DICT;
00201 
00202     switch(optionIndex)
00203     {
00204     case 0:
00205         // set the number of N-best results,
00206         // if this function is not called, one-best analysis is performed defaultly on Analyzer::runWithSentence().
00207         analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_NBEST, atoi(argv[2]));
00208 
00209         // command option: "--sentence N-best --dict DICT_PATH"
00210         if(argc == 5 && ! strcmp(argv[3], OPTION_DICT))
00211         {
00212             sysdict = argv[4];
00213         }
00214         break;
00215 
00216     case 1:
00217         // command option: "--string --dict DICT_PATH"
00218         if(argc == 4 && ! strcmp(argv[2], OPTION_DICT))
00219         {
00220             sysdict = argv[3];
00221         }
00222         break;
00223 
00224     case 2:
00225         // command option: "--stream INPUT OUTPUT --dict DICT_PATH"
00226         if(argc == 6 && ! strcmp(argv[4], OPTION_DICT))
00227         {
00228             sysdict = argv[5];
00229         }
00230         break;
00231 
00232     default:
00233         printUsage();
00234         exit(1);
00235     }
00236 
00237     // load dictioanry files
00238     knowledge->setSystemDict(sysdict);
00239     int result = knowledge->loadDict();
00240     if(result == 0)
00241     {
00242         cerr << "fail to load dictionary files" << endl;
00243         exit(1);
00244     }
00245     cout << "system dictionary: " << sysdict << endl;
00246 
00247     // set encoding type from the dictionary path
00248     string sysdictStr(sysdict);
00249     size_t first = sysdictStr.find_last_of('_');
00250     size_t last = sysdictStr.find_last_not_of('/');
00251     string encodeStr = sysdictStr.substr(first+1, last-first);
00252     Knowledge::EncodeType encode = Knowledge::decodeEncodeType(encodeStr.c_str());
00253     if(encode != Knowledge::ENCODE_TYPE_NUM)
00254     {
00255         cout << "encoding type: " << encodeStr << endl;
00256         knowledge->setEncodeType(encode);
00257     }
00258 
00259     // set knowledge
00260     analyzer->setKnowledge(knowledge);
00261 
00262     // no POS output
00263     //analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_TAGGING, 0);
00264 
00265     // output POS in alphabet format
00266     //analyzer->setOption(Analyzer::OPTION_TYPE_POS_FORMAT_ALPHABET, 1);
00267 
00268     switch(optionIndex)
00269     {
00270     case 0:
00271         testWithSentence(analyzer);
00272         break;
00273 
00274     case 1:
00275         testWithString(analyzer);
00276         break;
00277 
00278     case 2:
00279     {
00280         clock_t etime = clock();
00281         double dif = (double)(etime - stime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00282         cout << "knowledge loading time: " << dif << endl;
00283 
00284         testWithStream(analyzer, argv[2], argv[3]);
00285 
00286         dif = (double)(clock() - etime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00287         cout << "stream analysis time: " << dif << endl;
00288 
00289         dif = (double)(clock() - stime) / CLOCKS_PER_SEC;
00290         cout << "total time: " << dif << endl;
00291         break;
00292     }
00293 
00294     default:
00295         printUsage();
00296         exit(1);
00297     }
00298 
00299     // destroy instances
00300     delete knowledge;
00301     delete analyzer;
00302 
00303     return 0;
00304 }
